text: Nigar Mirzaliyeva (; born 28 April 2002) is an Azerbaijani footballer who plays as a defender for Women's Championship club Balxurma FK and the Azerbaijan women's national team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Azerbaijani women's footballers Category:Azerbaijan women's international footballers
title: Nigar Mirzaliyeva
